## Rozdeleni roli

```{r}
role_fa <- cela_data %>% select(starts_with("role_skauting_")) 
role_fa <- sapply(role_fa, as.character)
het.mat <- hetcor(role_fa)$cor

psych::fa.parallel(het.mat, n.obs = nrow(role_fa))

role_fa_res <- psych::fa(het.mat, n.obs = nrow(role_fa), nfactors = 5, rotate = "varimax")

m <- matrix(role_fa_res$loadings,ncol = 5)
row_names_fa <- rownames(role_fa_res$loadings)
m[m<0.3] <- NA

m <- tibble(m,) 
m %>% mutate(role = str_remove(row_names_fa,"role_skauting_")) %>% select(role,everything())


mds_df <- cela_data %>% 
  dist(method = "binary") %>% 
  cmdscale() 
plot(mds_df)


```
